decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-size: 14px;">The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:&nbsp;</span></p><ul><li><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><span style="line-height: 16.1px; font-size: 14px;">L01 (Location Plan);</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14px;">EP001 (Existing and Proposed Block Plan);</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14px;">P001 (Proposed floorplans);</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14px;">P002 (Proposed Elevations);</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14px;">P003 (Proposed Side Elevations);</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14px;">P004 (Proposed section);</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14px;">Reasonable Exemption Statement ( Dated 13.11.24);</span></span></li></ul>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the  side elevation of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey rear extension (Demolition of rear extension)
